title: Best of The Herd: 10/23/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/23/2019
description:
Colin warns people not to overthink the Lakers and the Clippers, the Clippers are better in almost every aspect from the front office to the bench. He explains why Tom Brady is ending his career the way LeBron wishes he could. FS1's Nick Wright comes on to argue with Colin about almost all of his opinions from the Wednesday's show. Plus, Colin explains why the NFL MVP discussion is dumb especially this early in the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
